title: Text of a Letter to Certain Congressional Committees on the United States Strategic Approach to the People’s Republic of China – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
May 21, 2020
May 19, 2020Dear Mr. Chairman:  (Dear Madam Chairwoman:)Consistent with section 1261 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019 (Public Law 115-232), I transmit herewith the United States Strategic Approach to the People’s Republic of China.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
